column4: Hello everybody! I'm new to Ubuntu, therefor I ask this rookie-question: I have just installed VirtualBox and I want to edit my icon for my Windows7-shortcut to my *.vdi-file. Where are the application-based icons stored?
Right click on the vdi and select roperties.  The icon that you see in the Proprties window is a button. Click on it to customize the icon.
Yes, I have done that. Now I just need to find the path to where Virtual Box stores its icons.
The shortcut had an icon earlier, but it got removed, somehow.
